This is a sub-structure in CSL_Aif2PdCommonSetup. This structure is used for configuring Pd 128 Dma channel configuration. More...

#include <csl_aif2.h>

Data Fields

Bool bChannelEn

Detailed Description

This is a sub-structure in CSL_Aif2PdCommonSetup. This structure is used for configuring Pd 128 Dma channel configuration.

Field Documentation

Bool CSL_Aif2PdChConfig::bChannelEn

Channel On/Off. Schedules a channel to be turned on or off.

CSL_Aif2LinkDataType CSL_Aif2PdChConfig::DataFormat

PD data format (Normal or UL RSA)
